categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This individual was a male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the final century of the Republic Classic era. During this time, this Master trained Byrch Dyshkava as his Padawan.

A Force-sensitive, this individual was educated in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order and eventually ascended to the rank of Jedi Master after years of devoted study and service. During this time, this Master selected the Human Byrch Dyshkava as his Padawan, and the two traveled the galaxy on journey missions for years on assignment for the Jedi High Council.

While on their journey mission, the Master noticed Padawan Dyshkava's growing ambition and that he seemed prone to overestimate his own skill. Deciding that a test was needed to try all which Dyshkava had learned, his Master assigned him his first solo mission to aid in negotiations on a distant planet. While the mission would challenge him mentally and emotionally, it was one of minimal physical risk. While Dyshkava could have completed the mission by calling his Master for aid, the arrogant Human was injured when a band of terrorists attacked the negotiations hall, and the boy gave into the dark side of the Force to complete the mission. The Master waited patiently for Dyshkava's return, but the young man never rejoined his mentor. Disappearing from the eye of even Grand Master Yoda, the Jedi Master and other members of the Order sought in vain for the wayward Dyshkava.
